en.today: The Capricorn moon brings laser focus to your highest aspirations, dear Aries, helping you accomplish much. However, the vibe can become rigid once the afternoon sets in and Chiron becomes agitated, making it essential to check in with your emotional and mental state before pushing yourself to the brink. Plan on meeting with friends after work once Luna enters Aquarius, resetting your heart and mind through fun and stimulating conversations. Excitement follows you late into the night while the moon, Mars, Uranus, Saturn, Neptune, and Pluto enter a kite formation, elevating your social standing throughout the next few days.

en.today: Recognize where you require more discipline and order, dearest Leo, as the Capricorn moon and Chiron align. You'll be reminded of just how capable you are, but you will need to get strategic and serious about reaching primary goals. Shift gears to prioritize loving connections once Luna enters Aquarius this evening, bringing an electrifying and romantic energy to the table. A buzz surrounds you as nightfall deepens and Luna forms a rare kite formation with Mars, Uranus, Saturn, Neptune, and Pluto. Interesting developments will reshape your social standing throughout the coming days, so be mindful to place yourself in positive situations where you can receive recognition and forge essential alliances.

en.today: Put your healing journey first, dear Taurus, as the Capricorn moon and Chiron align. This energy encourages soul searching and spiritual connection, offering warmth and celestial support. You'll feel energized and inspired to implement essential changes once Luna enters Aquarius this evening, especially when it comes to long-term goals and professional aspirations. Electrifying vibes follow you as night descends, heightening your motivation to work hard and establish new cycles that will bring out your best self. Get experimental and don't be afraid to make mistakes as you travel boldly toward great heights, trusting that your most innovative ideas will provide big rewards.

en.today: Loyalty and reliability will weigh heavily on your mind under the Capricorn moon, dearest Gemini. A harsh square with Chiron this afternoon forces you to conclude who your true friends are. Though letting go of people isn't always easy, you'll feel lighter and more sure of your choices once Luna enters Aquarius this evening. A pronounced sense that great things lie on the horizon will make it easier to look forward with optimism. New faces could emerge throughout the coming days as the moon triggers a rare kite formation between Mars, Uranus, Saturn, Neptune, and Pluto, encouraging you to seek out fresh connections.
